name: part_014
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO24_DAY1】hololive 5th fes. Capture the Moment hololive stage1 DAY1【チラ見せ】 [00xeNL3vdQo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_014.mov

scenes.description: Performance of 'Our Bright Parade' by various hololive members.
Transition and applause following the group performance.
Solo performance of 'Bishoujo Muzai♡Pirates' by Houshou Marine.

subtitles.original: 頼りない予感でも　いいよ
subtitles.english: Even if it's an unreliable premonition, it's fine

subtitles.original: 歌おう　恥ずかしくなんてないよ
subtitles.english: Let's sing, it's not embarrassing at all

subtitles.original: 誰も解けない　ミステリー
subtitles.english: A mystery no one can solve

subtitles.original: いつかまた会える　ミステリー
subtitles.english: A mystery where we can meet again someday

subtitles.original: あの日　ゼロに始まった　ストーリー
subtitles.english: The story that started at zero that day

subtitles.original: 数え切れない心は　数えるような想いじゃないさ
subtitles.english: Countless hearts are more than just countable feelings

subtitles.original: ほら今　僕らも　一つと呼ぼう
subtitles.english: Look, now let's call us one as well

subtitles.original: Parade Parade Parade 移りゆく今よ
subtitles.english: Parade Parade Parade, the changing present

subtitles.original: 許し合える世界が　夜を煌めく
subtitles.english: A world where we can forgive each other shines through the night

subtitles.original: Parade Parade Parade まだじゃないから
subtitles.english: Parade Parade Parade, it's not over yet

subtitles.original: お騒がせ旅人は　君と歩くのさ
subtitles.english: The rowdy travelers walk together with you

subtitles.original: 君と在ることなんだ
subtitles.english: It's all about being with you

subtitles.original: 高い声を聞けば
subtitles.english: When I hear that high-pitched voice

subtitles.original: 「おかえり」って叫ぶよ
subtitles.english: I'll shout "Welcome home!"

subtitles.original: 当たり前じゃないか
subtitles.english: Isn't it obvious?

subtitles.original: Parade Parade Parade 輝くんだよ
subtitles.english: Parade Parade Parade, keep on shining

subtitles.original: 暗がりを照らすのは　君と僕だ
subtitles.english: The ones who light up the darkness are you and I

subtitles.original: Parade Parade Parade 輝くんだよ
subtitles.english: Parade Parade Parade, keep on shining

subtitles.original: 不安も愛おしさも　連れておいで
subtitles.english: Bring along both your anxieties and your affections

subtitles.original: 果てぬ夢　晴れ　飛び出すさ
subtitles.english: The endless dream clears up, and we'll leap out

subtitles.original: ささやかな祈りは光　終わりなき道を
subtitles.english: Vibrant prayers are light on an endless path

subtitles.original: 君と飛び込んで行く　素敵な舞台だ
subtitles.english: Diving in with you, it's a wonderful stage

subtitles.original: ここから　これから　Our Bright Parade Parade
subtitles.english: From here, from now on, Our Bright Parade Parade

subtitles.original: Our Bright Parade Parade
subtitles.english: Our Bright Parade Parade

subtitles.original: うー！
subtitles.english: Woo!

subtitles.original: ドキドキして　ニュ〜ッ！
subtitles.english: Heart pounding, nyu~!

subtitles.original: ホロフェス、行きますよー！
subtitles.english: Holofes, here we go!

subtitles.original: 無罪！無罪！無罪！無罪！無罪！無罪！
subtitles.english: Innocent! Innocent! Innocent! Innocent! Innocent! Innocent!

subtitles.original: キラキラ　フラフラ
subtitles.english: Sparkling, swaying

subtitles.original: 美少女無罪♡パイレーツ
subtitles.english: Bishoujo Muzai♡Pirates

subtitles.original: ねぇ、見てよ？年齢なんて関係ないってさ
subtitles.english: Hey, look at me. Age doesn't matter, right?

subtitles.original: そういう面倒くさいのも含めて愛してくれるって
subtitles.english: That you'd love me including all that troublesome stuff

subtitles.original: ねぇ、ねぇ、言ったよね？
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, you said it, didn't you?

subtitles.original: 言ってない？フン、そういうこと言うんだ。
subtitles.english: You didn't? Hmph, so you're gonna say that.

subtitles.original: ちなみにこの船では美少女無罪が適用されますけど
subtitles.english: By the way, "Beautiful Girl Innocence" is applied on this ship

subtitles.original: 混ぜて　魔法で若返り
subtitles.english: Mix it up, becoming younger with magic

subtitles.original: 秘密の素顔は君だけ
subtitles.english: My secret face is for you only

subtitles.original: 特別ですよ！
subtitles.english: It's special!

subtitles.original: あっち向いちゃ嫌よ
subtitles.english: Don't look away

subtitles.original: 皆の者なんじゃ…
subtitles.english: Everyone else is just...

subtitles.original: はしゃいでないわ　近寄るまで　宝の島にして欲しい気分
subtitles.english: I'm not frolicking. Until you get close, I want to be a treasure island

subtitles.original: 絶対！
subtitles.english: Absolutely!

subtitles.original: キャプテン・セーリング、ヨッシャ！
subtitles.english: Captain sailing, yosha!

subtitles.original: 君の意志が目指した空
subtitles.english: The sky your will aimed for

subtitles.original: 本当は自信ないけど　頑張っちゃう！
subtitles.english: Actually, I don't have confidence, but I'll do my best!

subtitles.original: きゅんきゅんきゅんきゅん　恋する瞳は17歳
subtitles.english: Kyun kyun kyun kyun, eyes in love are 17 years old

subtitles.original: 全人類なっちゃえ　お友達…？
subtitles.english: Let all of humanity become friends...?

subtitles.original: ドキドキして　ニュ〜ッ！
subtitles.english: Heart pounding, nyu~!

subtitles.original: まだ早い！
subtitles.english: It's too early!

subtitles.original: だだだ、ダメですか？フリルの服、ちから
subtitles.english: D-D-D, is it no good? The power of frilled clothes...

subtitles.original: そんなことないよ！
subtitles.english: That's not true!

subtitles.original: だだだ、でも魔法少女になってみたい
subtitles.english: B-B-B, but I want to try becoming a magical girl

subtitles.original: ギリギリ有罪！
subtitles.english: Barely guilty!

subtitles.original: 皆の御三家、いいかな？船長！
subtitles.english: Everyone's Big Three, is it okay? Captain!

subtitles.original: 敬礼！君も本当は若い
subtitles.english: Salute! You're actually young too

subtitles.original: なんだって振るから　見捨てないで君たち
subtitles.english: I'll do anything for you, so don't abandon me, you guys

subtitles.original: ヨッシャ！いい感じ！
subtitles.english: Yosha! Looking good!

subtitles.original: たまに弄って　それ（でも）いいの
subtitles.english: Occasionally tease me, that's fine too

subtitles.original: むしろ喉の奥、本気にしちゃえ
subtitles.english: Rather, take it seriously from the bottom of your heart

subtitles.original: 嵐の仲間
subtitles.english: Comrades of the storm

subtitles.original: 一緒に行こう！
subtitles.english: Let's go together!

subtitles.original: ハートにズーム、ヨッシャ！
subtitles.english: Zoom into the heart, yosha!

subtitles.original: あれ、あれ？どした？メンタルさよならって言っちゃって
subtitles.english: Wait, wait? What happened? Saying goodbye to your mental state

subtitles.original: 構ってくれる君が好き！
subtitles.english: I like the you who pays attention to me!

subtitles.original: きゅんきゅんきゅんきゅん　優しくしてね　17歳
subtitles.english: Kyun kyun kyun kyun, be kind to me, 17 years old

subtitles.original: ずっと見ててね、お楽しみ？
subtitles.english: Keep watching forever, looking forward to it?
